title: 1 MULINDI LIZYA IMPETA
content:
CS 683. CH 619 AH 350 SDAH 368

1. MULINDI LIZYA IMPETA

WATCHMAN BLOW THE GOSPEL TRUMPET

Doh is Bb
1
Mulindi lizya impeta, Bayowe bantu boonse;
Uteleela mazwi aya, Uyakufutusyigwa
CIINDULULO:
Mulindi lizya impeta, Koilizya koonse;
Lizya 'mpeta yamulumbe, Kuti ba angulululwe.

2
Koilizya mumalundu, amumabanda oonse;
Lwizyi kambauka mazwi, Lwiimbo lwakufutuka.

3
Koilizya mumazila, Akusimpila nyika;
Ipobwe lilibambidwe, Taata ulatulinda.

4
Kolizizya balemenwe, Abakatede boonse,
Lizya kutamba kwa Jesu, "Koboola kuli ndime."

title: 2: MWAMI A MULYANGO
content:
CS 930

CH 546 AH 411

2: MWAMI A MULYANGO
THE COMING KING

Doh is G
1
Mwami uli amulyango Wakayumuna Ciingano
Elyo abo baluleme Uyakuba bweza


CIINDULULO:
AmÕlyango amÕlyango amÕlyango E Uli amÕlyango
Ulaboola ulaboola U linvwi amulyango

2
Zibonisyo zilaamba Kuboola kwakwe kwa swena
Kufwa mbaana tulabona Kuboola kwa Mwami.

3
Utalangi zya munyika Mapenzi aya ta mani
Ulasika Mufutuli kupenga kumane

4
Elyo nyika eyo impya lyakuba kutamani
Lufu talukabi omo Kube kutamani.

title: 3: Busyu a busyu
content:
CS 861AH 319

CH 545SDAH 206
3: Busyu a busyu
FACE TO FACE

Doh is Bb
1
Busyu abusyu a Klistu Kukabe buti hena?
Ndakumubona Kujulu, Uyo wakandifwinda.

CIINDULULO:
Busyu abusyu aboobo Nituya ku bonana,
Mubulemu bwakwe boonse ndilyona nka mubone!

2
Lino ndabona kasyonto Cisizi sizi sizi
Pesi buzuba bwa colwe Jesu Klistu wa mfwida

3
Ci ya kundikomanisya Mapenzi a kumana
Nzila zyoonse zya kubota Musinze wa kumana

4
Busyu a busyu tu swane Ndika mubone Jesu
Waka tunununa iswe Aluyando lupati

title: 4: U LA KU BOOLA
content:
CS 914AH 407

CH 669
4: U LA KU BOOLA
HEÕS COMING

Doh is Eb
1
Kambo ka telelwa mwenzu nka botu, Nali kule kule a munzi!
Ndiilyona Jesu u la kuliboonya, Bulelo bu la boola.

CIINDULULO:
U la ku bola a lino, ndi li zyi, Kunyika eyi alimwi;
Benzu ba katede ba la ku unka, A zyokeela ku tu lela.

2
Zyumbwe zya kaindi, nkoba ona benzu, Zi la kuja lulwa alimwi;
Zyuulu zyuulu zila ona mu lwizi, Zi la ku ba munyika

3
Tu la ku swangana, tatu kandani, Tu la kwimba kunununwa;
Bala ku zwa konse konse bantu, ku lumbaizya Mwami

4
Colwe, colwe, akube colwe alimwi, Twa syomeka tuya kubako;
A mu syome mu, linde a ka sike, Tu ka same misyini

title: 5: MUNZI ULI KULE SENA?
content:
CS 845AH 414

CH 665SDAH 439
5: MUNZI ULI KULE SENA?
HOW FAR FROM HOME?

Doh is Eb
1
Munzi uli kule sena? Nda ka mu buzya mulindi,
Wa ka amba: ÒMasiku a yeya ku mana;
Leka ku lila, fwambana;
Cisyomyo ci la ku kweenzya
Limwi u ka sike Ku Ônyika ya kusalala.Ó

2
Nda ka buzya syilumamba, Wa ka imba lwimbo olu;
ÒNdalwanisya abukano, Ndila koma koonse;
Utalili bikilila, Limwi mulimo wamana.
Tuli zyi tu la ku pegwa colwe, no twa koma.Ó

3
Munzi wesu tuli kule, Kuyeya kubotu oku!
Kulakomanisya mwenzu Mumusinzo wakwe;
Utalili, tu la ku Swangana kutamani, kwakwe,
Kupenga kwa mana tu li Mu munzi wa Tata

title: 6: JESU U LA BOOLA
content:
CS 877AH 415

CH 549SDAH 598
6: JESU U LA BOOLA
WATCH, YE SAINTS

Doh is Db
1
A mu linde basalilwe, Kujulu ku la zungana;
Malampe enu ka yaka, Mu a bambe, u la bola

CIINDULULO:
Mu lange, ula bola, Jesu u bola a bwami!
U bola a bwami bunji, Mu lange u la bola

2
Mu yeye cisyomyo cakwe, U la pailila bakwe;
Zikobelo zya sazyingwa a mu bule kambo kakwe.

3
Malelo a la zungana, Tolela! u la ku bola;
Kambauka luse lwakwe, I tana lila impeta.

4
Jesu wa mwita, babisyi; U ci kombelela babi;
Mufwambe na ta na leka, Cindi ci taninga mana.

title: 7: BA LA KU SALALA
content:
CS 852 AH 449

CH 418SDAH 218
7:BA LA KU SALALA
WHEN HE COMETH

Doh is E
1
Naya ku bola alimwi, Kulonda lubono,
Lubono lubotu botu; Bonse banaÕkwe.

CIINDULULO:
Ba la ku ba mbuli
Inyenyezi mu musyini
Bala ku salalisya
Musyini wakwe

2
U la ku londa mabwe, A mwekesya kabotu,
Mabwe onse a salala, Bonse banaÕkwe.

3
Twana, twana, O tu yanda, Mufutuli wato,
Otu, ntu tubwe tu mweka, Tonse twanaÕkwe.

title: 8: NI BA YA KUZULWA BOONSE
content:
CS 865SDAH 216

8: NI BA YA KUZULWA BOONSE
WHEN THE TRUMPET

Doh is Ab
1
Niya ku lila impeta cindi Ciya ku mana, Bwasika buzuba obu ta mani;
Bafutulwa ba ya ku bangana
Kunyika kuya ndi laku ba Õko, ni ba ya ku zulwa.

CIINDULULO:
Ni ba ya Éku zulwa bonse, Nibaya É ku zulwa bonse,
Ni ba ya Éku zulwa bonse, Ni ba ya É.
Ku zulwa bonse, nda baÕko

2
Ku cindi cibotu, ni ba ya ku buka baKlistu,
Ba la ku ba a kufutuka kupya; Basalilwe ni ba ya ku
Bunganyiwa mu munzi, Ndi ya ku ba ko, ni ba ya ku zulwa

3
A tu mu nyonene Mwami, li ka bbile izuba,
A tu ambilane luyando lwakwe, Kwa mana kufutuka kwesu
Mulimo wa mana Ndi ya ku ba ko, ni ba ya ku zulwa

title: 9: JESU ULA BOOL’ ALIMWI
content:
CS 929 AH 406 CH 541 SDAH 213

9: JESU ULA BOOL’ ALIMWI
LIFT UP THE TRUMPET

Doh is A
1
Lizya impeta imvwike konse Jes’ ula bol’ alimwi
A mukomane benzu muimbe Jes’ ula bol’ alimwi

CIINDULULO:
Jesu Mwini,Jesu mwini, Jes’ ulabol’ alimwi

2
Kambuka mu malundu onse Jes’ ulabol’ alimwi
Mwana mbelele ubol’ abwami Jes’ ula bol’ alimwi.

3
Lwizi kambauka nguzu zyakwe,Jes’ ula bol’ alimwi.
Inkomwe zitelele mulumbe Jes’ ula bol’ alimwi.

4
‘Mpuwo zya nyika zyambila bantu Jes’ ula bol’ alimwi.
Mas’ abilila lino twa zyiba Jes’ ula bol’ alimwi.

5
‘Mikowa yabilila twa zyiba Jes’ ulabol’ alimwi.
Myuwo tumbizi twaindilila Jes’ ulabol’ alimwi.

title: 10: TU LA KU SWANA MULONGA
content:
CS 907 AH 430

CH 555SDAH 432
10: TU LA KU SWANA MULONGA
SHALL WE GATHER?

Doh is Eb
1
Tu la ku swana Ômulonga Nko ba enda bangele;
Menda a la enda lyoonse Ku cuno cakwe Mwami

CIINDULULO:
Tu la ku swana Ômulonga, ku mulonga mubotu mubotu;
Tu swangane a basalilwe Ku mulonga a Leza.

2
A nkomwe yawo mulonga, Menda a la mwekesya,
Tu la kwenda mu ku lumba, Buzuba bu tamani

3
No tu taninga sika ko, Tu la tula mikuli;
Luse lu la ku tu vuna, Tu la pegwa misyini,
myoyo iyakutulumba lwiimbo lwakuumuna

4
Tu la ku fwamba ku sika, Musinzo u la mana,
Myoyo I la ku seka ko buzuba butamani.

title: 11: NDI LA KU KU CILILA
content:
CS 409 AH 282

CH 266SDAH 623
11: NDI LA KU KU CILILA
I WILL FOLLOW THEE

Doh is Ab
1
Ndi la ku cilila Jesu Konse na kuba buti;
Nko ya ndi la ku cilila, Mwami ndiku cilile

CIINDULULO:
Ndi la ku cilila Jesu, Wa ka ndi fwida ime;
Kuti bonse ba ku siya, Ndi la ku ku cilila.

2
Kuti Ônzila I la mamvwa, Ne I siya bunene,
Wa enda kumbele kwangu, Ndi la ku ku cilila.

3
Ne ndi penga cinicini Ne ndi sunkwa bunene,
Nda yeya wa ka pengesya, Nda seka ku cilila.

title: 12: ITINTI LI LA BULOWA
content:
CS 146 AH 135

CH 163 SDAH 336
12: ITINTI LI LA BULOWA
THERE IS A FOUNTAIN

Doh is C
1
Itinti li la bulowa
Bu zwa kuli Jesu;
Babisyi oba nyikizya
Ba la sowa kubi
Ba la sowa kubi
Ba la sowa kubi

2
Mubi wa ka komana
Ku bona tinti elyo
Ni ndi muntu mubi omo,
Ndi la ku li sanzya,
Ndi la ku li sanzya,
Ndi la ku li sanzya.

3
Bulowa obu yandika
Ta bu sowi Ônguzu,
Limwi Ônkamu I futulwe
I ta bisyi limbi,
I ta bisyi limbi,
I ta bisyi limbi

title: 13: MBULI CAANDA CI LA TUBA BU
content:
CS 64 AH 200

CH 592SDAH 318
13: MBULI CAANDA CI LA TUBA BU
LORD JESUS, I LONG TO BE PERFECTLY WHOLE

Doh is G#
1
O Mwami ndayanda ku maninina
Ndayanda kuti u kale mu moyo,
Ko ingusya mizimo yonse yangu
Ko ndi sanzya ndi tube mbuli canda

CIINDULULO:
Mbuli canda ci la tuba bu,
E ndi sanzye, ndi tube mbuli canda

2
Jesu ko ndi langa noli ku julu
Ndi gwasye, nda yanda kuli sungula,
Nda lisungula, ndi tambule Jesu,
Nda lisungula, ndi ta mbule Jesu.

3
Mwami nda linda a kubi kilila,
Ko bola ko ndilenga moyo mupya;
A ba kuyanda to kwe ku ba kasya,
A baku yanda to kwe ku ba kasya.

title: 14: MVWA MALI ALOKA
content:
CS 573

14: MVWA MALI ALOKA
HEAR THE PENNIES DROPPING

Doh is C
1
Mvwa mali aloka
Komvwa mbwa loka
Onse ngokwa Jesu
Ula kwa tola.

CIINDULULO:
Ngwele ngwele ngwele ngwele
Telela loka onse ngakwe Jesu
Uya kwa tola.

2
Ngwele ngwele lyonse
Bonse a bana
Nzipengo zya Jesu
Bapa bana ÔKwe.

3
Ngwele ngwele Ôtupe
Milumbo yesu
Ku Mwana Ôkwe Leza
Ula I yanda.

title: 15: JESU  U LA NDI YANDA
content:
CS 283 AH 455

AH 455SDAH 190
15: JESU U LA NDI YANDA
JESUS LOVES ME

Doh is Eb
1
Jesu u la ndi yanda, Li la Ôamba iBaibele,
Twana tonse ntu twakwe, U la tupa inguzu.

CIINDULULO
U la ndi yanda, Nda yandwa Jesu;
U la ndi yanda Li la mba iBaibele.

2
Jesu u la ndi yanda, Jesu wa ka ndi fwida
U la ku ndi tubya bu; A tu njile twanakwe.

3
Jesu u la ndi yanda, No nda ciswa bunene;
Mu cuuno ca kujulu U la bola kuli Ôme.

4
Jesu u la ndi yanda, U la ndi sololela;
Kuti nda mu yandisya, ndi la ku tolwa kwakwe.

title: 16: MAULU MA SYONTO
content:
CS 569 AH 459

16: MAULU MA SYONTO
I WASHED MY HANDS

Doh is Ab
1
Nda samba maanza angu, Kabotu nda tuba,
Nda mupa Jesu kuti; A mu bele kele.

CIINDULULO:
Maulu Masyonto, A mu cenjele,
Milimo ya Jesu, A ndiicite.

2
Ngambile matwi angu, Akuteelelesye,
Mulimo wo Ônse mubotu, Ma Ônza a cite.

3
Meso angu alange, Milimo mibotu,
Akasye nzila zibi, A kaÕmbo ka Jesu.

title: 17: LUYANDO LU KOMANYA
content:
CS 567 SDAH 579

AH 454
17: LUYANDO LU KOMANYA
TIS LOVE THAT MAKES US HAPPY

Doh is Bb
1
Luyando lu komanya Lubosya inzila
Lulatugwasha kuye Ôya kuyanda bakweesu

CIINDULULO:
Luyando lu laitwa Leza Tuyande leza mu bo tu,
Luyando lu ko manya, Lubo sya inzila
Lula tugwasya ku yeeya Kuyanda ba kwesu

2
Munyika ya mapenzi, Malwazi alufu
A luyando tula sola Ku vuna mukwesu

3
Bumi obu bwa mana, Twa kuya ku julu
Tu kaimbe kutamani Luyando lwa Jesu.

title: 18: KA MU YA BASYILUMAMBA
content:
CS 656 AH 370

CH 360 SDAH 612
18: KA MU YA BASYILUMAMBA
ONWARD CHRISTIAN SOLDIERS

Doh is E
1
Ka mu ya basyilumamba ba Klistu!
Cingano cakwe ci la ya kumbele
Mukomi, u la solola lumamba,
Ka mu ya mu lwanine Mwami wenu!

CIINDULULO:
Ka mu ya basyilumamba ba Klistu!
Cingano cakwe ci la ya kumbele.

2
Inkamu ya Satani I la yowa,
Ka mu ya basyilumamba, mu kone!
Bulelo bwa Satani bu la zunganya,
Bakwesu, amu imbe lwa ku Koma.

3
Malelo manjimanji a ka inda,
Inkamu ya Leza I tana komwa;
Satani ta kwe kuyanda inkamu;
Cisyomyo ca Jesu ci la ku ima.

4
A mu swangane nkamu ya Jesu,
A tu imbisye lwimbo lwa ku koma!
Colwe cipati, kuli Jesu Mwami;
Mbo tu ya kuimbisya kutamani.

title: 19: MUYA KO LI BAMBA
content:
CS 788 SDAH 605

CH 358
19: MUYA KO LI BAMBA
MY SOUL BE ON THY GUARD

Doh is C
1
Muya ko li bamba! Mbanji ba ku lwana;
Nkamu ya mubi I sola Ku ku nyanga colwe.

2
Ko linda, ko lwana! U ta yowi, ima!
Ko lwana mazuba onse, Lomba ku gwasyigwa.

3
U ta Ômbi wa koma, U ta biki ntobo,
Ta kwe ku mana u ta na, Ku pegwa musyini.

title: 20: BUKA BUUMI BWANGU
content:
CS 793 AH 325

CH 355 SDAH 611
20: BUKA BUUMI BWANGU
AWAKE MY SOUL

Doh is G
1
Buka bumi bwangu yuma
Ko ya u taiimi,
Kujulu ku la kuita,
U jane mu syini.

2
Ngu Leza Mwami u Kwita,
Usike ku julu
Janza lya kwe litambika
Musyini wa buumi.

3
I kumbi lya ba kamboni
Lila kuli ndiila
Luba nzila zya kaindi
Koya uta cebi.

4
Mufutuli ko tukwela
Tu ta like kwenda,
Tukome mazuba onse
Tutule mikuli.

title: 21: NDA BOOLA KU CIINGANO
content:
CS 109 AH 184

CH 600 SDAH 307
21: NDA BOOLA KU CIINGANO
I AM COMING TO THE CROSS

Doh is G
1
Nda boÕla ku Ci ngano Nda penga nda ce tala
Nda sowa zintu zyonse Ndi jane lufutuko.

CIINDULULO:
Jesu Mwami nda syoma Ndiwe Mwana mbelele
Nda komba ku Cingano Undifutule lino

2
Ndali ku yandaula Bubi bwa ndi vulila
Jesu u landambila Ndila ku kutu bya bu.

3
Lino nda lisungula Nda siya zya munyika
Ndibe muntu u yeya Ku kabe kutamani

title: 22: ANDIME
content:
CS 174 AH 151

CH 208
22: ANDIME
LORD, I HEAR

Doh is G
1
Mwami ndamvwa luse lwako ndowa citila bamwi
Bamwi balelekwa kale Undi leleke ime.

CIINDULULO:
Andime andime Undi leleke ime.

2
Tata Ôwe utandiindi Na kuba ndi mubisyi
Ukonzya kundeengelela A luse lutamani.

3
Nda li kukala mu cibi Ku kunyansya ku bya Ôbi
Nda kayanda nyika Ôeyi Lino ndilekelele.

4
O muya uta ndiindi OÕ tujalula bofu
Ndibe kamboni wa Jesu Nda Ômbile izwi lyako.

title: 23: KONDIZUZYA  LINO
content:
CS 308 AH 152

CH 212 SDAH 260
23: KONDIZUZYA LINO
HOVER OÕER ME HOLY SPIRIT

Doh is G
1
Ndivumbe muya mubotu, Kosanzya bumi bwangu;
Kobola lino nda penga, Kondi zuzya a muya.

CIINDULULO:
Kobola, kobola, undinjile mu moyo
Kondizuzya nsetekane uzuzye moyo wangu.

2
Nzuzye a muya mubotu Nakuba ndi mulwazi
Pesi nda ku yanda iwe Koboola undi zu zye.

3
Ndi mubombe bombe mubi, Ndona ansi ku komba
Muya utamani bola, U ndi zu zye luyando.

4
Nsa nzye, ntube, ndifutule, Nko manisye, ndeleke;
Ndiwe undi komanisye, A ku nzuzya mu moyo.

title: 24: NDA KUYANDA CIINDI COONSE
content:
CS 609AH 222

CH 258SDAH 483
24: NDA KUYANDA CIINDI COONSE
I NEED THEE EVERY HOUR

Doh is Ab
1
Nda kuyanda Jesu iwe Mwami wangu,
Izwi lyako lila ndipa kuumuna,

CHORUS
Ndayanda we ndayanda, CiindÕ eci ndayanda
Kondileleka Mwami! Nda boola kwako.

2
Ndakuyanda Jesu Kokala ambebo;
Ku sunkwa kula ku ba ku ubauba.

3
Ndakuyanda Jesu A mukukomana
Bola ku fwambaana Ainguzu Zyako.

4
Nda kuyanda Jesu Webo nditondezya,
A kulaililwa kube kwa kasimpe.

5
Nda kuyanda Jesu ÔWe Usetekene;
Uncite mbe wako, Mbe Ulelekedwe.

title: 25: NDA MUSUNGULILA KOONSE
content:
CS 51 AH 190

CH 573SDAH 309
25: NDA MUSUNGULILA KOONSE
ALL TO JESUS I SURRENDER

Doh is D
1
Nda musu ngulila konse, Nda mupa Jesu wangu,
Ndi la ku mu syoma lyonse Ndi la kala a Jesu.

CIINDULULO:
Nda Ku sungula nkwe ndali jisi,
Jesu wangu nda ku sunguliila konse.
2
Nda musu ngulila konse, Ndi la muvunta mina
Ku komana kwa munyika Nda mu le kela Jesu.

3
Nda musunguli la konse, Ndi cite ndibe wako,
Ndi tilile muya wako Kuti ndi ku zyi bi sye.

4
Nda mu sungulila konse, Lino nda mutelela;
Wa ka ndi pa kufutuka, A colwe cibe cakwe.

title: 26: MBWE NDI BELE
content:
CS 145AH 191

CH 222SDAH 313, 314
26: MBWE NDI BELE
JUST AS I AM

Doh is Eb
1
Mbwe ndi bele nsi kwe cintu
Pele bulowa bwa Jesu
Wa ndi �ta ku bola kwako.

CIINDULULO:
Mwana Ômbelele nda bola.

2
Mbwe ndi bele, nsyi lindi pe,
Ku ndi gusya zinyonyono,
Bulowa bu la ndi sanzya.

3
Mbwe ndi bele, nda zunganywa
Kulengaula bunene,
A kulwana a kuyowa.

4
Mbwe ndi bele, luse lwako
Wa gusya ku sinka Ônzila,
Lino ndi la ku ba wako.

title: 27: TWA KU LUMBA LEZA
content:
CS 396AH 157

27: TWA KU LUMBA LEZA
WE PRAISE THEE O GOD

Doh is G
1
Twa lumba Leza kambo ka mwanakwe,
A Jesu wa ka fwa Wa ya kujulu.

CIINDULULO:
Aleluya a ku lumbwe Aleluya Amen,
Aleluya! A ku lumbwe Tu buzye Jesu.

2
Twa lumba Leza Wa ka tuma muya,
O wa ka tu tondezya Mufutuli.

3
A lumbwe Mwana Ambelele Jesu,
O wa ka tu gusya mu Kubi konse.

4
A lumbwe Leza Wa luzyalo lonse,
Owa ka tu nununa A bulowa.

title: 28: KO YANDA KU LOMA
content:
CS 485AH 276

CH 603SDAH 500
28: KO YANDA KU LOMA
TAKE TIME TO BE HOLY

Doh is F
1
Ko yanda ku loma, amba o Mwami;
Kala aye lyonse ko lya ijwi;
Ko yanda ba Jesu, gwasya batete,
U ta lubi cintu, yanda kulelwa.

2
Ko yanda ku loma, Ônyika ya binda;
Ko paila lyonse a Jesu pele,
Wa langa Jesu u la ba mbwabele,
Ba la ku mu bona kuli Ôwe bantu.

3
Ko yanda ku loma, ka gwasye Jesu;
U ta citi cintu wa ta mu buzya,
Mu kuseka o kupenga, Cilila,
U langa Jesu, syoma ijwi lyakwe.

4
Ko yanda ku loma, ko umunisya;
Koyeya o milimo, e kwelele;
Ne nga twae enzyiwa luyando lwakwe,
No ya ku bambilwa ku mu nyonena

title: 29: KALA AMBEBO
content:
CS 655AH 40

CH 50SDAH 50
29KALA AMBEBO
ABIDE WITH ME

Doh is Eb
1
Kala Ômbebo mudima wasika
Kwasiya konse kala ambebo
Nsi jisi mugwasyi ndili ndiike
Jesu kondigwasya kala Ômbebo

2
Bumi bwesu busyonto bwamana
Ku komana kwa nyika kwamana
Zintu zyonse zya ndisandu kila
Uta ndisiyi kala ambebo.

3
Uuta kali kasyonto ambebo
Nkale mbe wako mazuba onse
Nganguluke mbikilile lyonse
Kobola Mwami kala ambebo

4
Nyanda busyu bwako zindi zyonse
Luse lwako lulakoma mubi
Hena nkwali ukwiinda inguzu?
Mulufu, mubumi kala Ômbebo.

5
Nsiyowi kuti koli ambebo
Misonzi a ku cisa nseyowi
Lufu, lubole, lwako lwa mana
Nja ku koma nauli ambebo.

title: 30: IZUBA LILA BBILA
content:
CS 339AH 41

CH 51SDAH 51
30IZUBA LILA BBILA
DAY IS DYING IN THE WEST

Doh is Ab
1
I Ôzuba lila bbila, lya swangana anyika
Linda Ôwe ko paila mimuni yatuba mujulu monse.

CIINDULULO
ÔSweya, sweya, sweya Mwami Leza
Julu anyika konse balumbaizye Leza u tamani.

2
Mwami wa bumi ansi, Anganda yako mpati
Tubole tukuyande ku luba lwa luyando lu tamani

3
Masiku na siya-mbi, Leza ula tu bamba
Mubulemu a luse Bwanyenyezi zimweka tulyokezye.

4
Nitu fwa iswe tonse, Twa zinda inyenyezi
Mwami wa luse bola, Utubusye kulufu lukamane.

title: 31: IZUBA LYA MUYA WANGU
content:
CS 775AH 35

CH 321SDAH 502
31IZUBA LYA MUYA WANGU
SUN OF MY SOUL

Doh is F
1
Ozuba lya muya wangu,
Taku masiku noliko
Nsi yandi kuti ikumbi
Li sinkile meso angu

2
Ukuti tulo tubotu
Tu sinkizya meso angu
Ndi simpe ku yeya ndiwe,
Elyo ndi la ku onesya.

3
Ko kala ambebo lyonse,
Nsi kwe ku kala ndilike
Kala ambebo masiku,
Nda yowa ku fwa, ko te wo.

4
Kuti nda buka ndi lele
Ndi tana unka ku nyona;
Limwi ndi ka linyikizye
Mu mulonga wa luyando

title: 32: BBWE ELI NGU MWAMI WESU
content:
CS 505AH 211

CH 585SDAH 528
32BBWE ELI NGU MWAMI WESU
THE LORDÕS OUR ROCK

Doh is F
1
Bbwe eli ngu Mwami wesu Tuya ku yubila mumo
Na kuba ku katazyigwa Nko cili conde ciyumu.

CIINDULULO:
Nciyumu Conde Ca nguzu, Cimvule cindi nikupya
Mwendezyi wa ba endenda Nko cili conde ciyumu

2
Cisitilizyo syikati Tuya ku yubila mumo
Muntu takwe kutu yosya Nko cili conde ciyumu

3
Mapenzi navula buti, Tuya ku yubila mumo
Tula jana muli Leza, Nkocil ÔI conde ciyumu.

4
Citijilo eci ndi Bbwe Tuya ku yubila mumo
Koba ndiwe utugwasya Nko cili conde ciyumu.

title: 33: U NDI SOLOLELA
content:
CS 677AH 292

CH 393SDAH 537
33U NDI SOLOLELA
HE LEADTH ME

Doh is D
1
Mwami wa ndi sololela! Nga majwi a kuumuna!
Nkwe ndi cita, onkwe ndi ya, Luboko lwakwe lu ndezya.

CIINDULULO:
U la ndezya, ula ndenzya, Mbwa ndenzya luboko lwakwe;
Ndi la ku ba mucilili, Mbwa ndi sololela Jesu.

2
Ne ndi ba mu ku siya mbi, Antela mukukomana
Na ku ba ku penga kwini, U ci indi enzya kabotu.

3
Ndi jate itansyi lyako, Nsi ku yandi kutongoka,
Ndi zulide nkwe ndi jisi, Mbwa li Leza undi enzya.

4
Wa mana mulimo wangu, No nda koma mu luzyalo,
Nsyi kwe ku lu yowa lufu, Jesu mbwa ndi sololela.

title: 34: KUPONA KWANGU NKUBOTU
content:
CS 516AH 250

CH 313SDAH 530
34KUPONA KWANGU NKUBOTU
WHEN PEACE LIKE A RIVER

Doh is Db
1
Kumuna kula ndime na ndipenga Na kuba kuusa kwa vula
Na kuba buti nda kaiya kale kwabota kuli Ôme.

CIINDULULO
Kwabota kuli Ôme Kwabota kwabota Kuli Ôme.

2
Kuti Satani waleta masunko Ula jana ndi mu yumu
Jesu wandi gwasya anguzu zyakwe Wakandi tilila bulowa.

3
Nda komana nkaambo ndalekelelwa Cinyonyono cangu conse
Cagagailwa a cingano cakwe Ndalumba ndalumba O Mwami.

4
Buzuba bufwambe tukaswangane Makumbi a jaluluke
Mpeta ilile Jesu bole E kwabota kwabota kuli Ôme.

title: 35: YAMA KU MANZA
content:
CS 503AH 261

CH 611SDAH 469
35YAMA KU MANZA
WHAT A FELLOWSHIP

Doh is A
1
Ku swangana munzila ya Leza,
Yama ku manza ata mani
Mbonda lelekwa, Mbonda umuna
Yama ku manza atamani.

CIINDULULO
Yama, yama, yama ku manza a tamani
Yama, yama, kumanza Ôtu vunane lyonse

2
Nku botu buti mu lwendo olu
Yama ku manza ata mani
Yatuba nzila mazuba onse
Yama ku manza ata mani

3
Njowe nzi hena, ntije nzi hena
Yama ku manza atamani
Ndi la ku muna nkambo nda Mwami
Yama ku manza ata mani.

title: 36: NDA KU SYOMA MWAMI
content:
CS 108AH 204

CH 246SDAH 517
36NDA KU SYOMA MWAMI
MY FAITH LOOKS UP TO THEE

Doh is Eb
1
Nda ku syoma Mwami, Mwana wa Mbelele, U salala;
Komvwa ne ncilomba, Gusya bubi bwangu
Ndi be Mwana wako ku tamani

2
Kondi yu mya moya, Ndiyumye mu bumi Ndizyibisye;
Mbo wa ka ndifwinda, Ndi kuyandisyisye,
Mbe u ta sanduki cindi coonse.

3
Nda enda munzila Akuusa kubi Nsolo lele;
Tanda cibi conse Ndyusule misozyi
Tandi le kele li ndizi mine.

title: 37: MUNSI KWAKO
content:
CS 663AH 312

CH 382SDAH 473
37MUNSI KWAKO
NEARER, MY GOD TO THEE

Doh is G
1
Munsi kwako Leza, munsi kwako
Na ciba cingano nce ndi bweza
Lwimbo lwangu ndolu, munsi kwako Leza,

CIINDULULO
Munsi kwako Leza Munsi kwako.

2
Ndaba mbuli mwenzu, kwa siya mbi
Ndaba, mu mu dima, ko ndi bweza
Mu ku lo ta ndi be munsi kwako Leza.

3
Nzila na ibonwe ya kuyako
Konse nko ndi pegwa muluzyalo
Bangele bandita, munsi kwako Leza.

4
Nda ba amababa ndi uluke,
Ndi lube izuba mu kuya ko,
Lwimbo lwangu ndolu, munsi kwako Leza.

title: 38: A TU IME AÕBWE
content:
CS 509

38A TU IME AÕBWE
FIRMLY STAND FOR GOD

Doh is Eb
1
A muyume munzila ya Mwami Na kuba mapenzyi a tupenzya,
I Ôbwe li la pa nguzu a bumi Mubi na swena a fwa fwi.

CIINDULULO
Twi mikile a Bbwe, A nguzu, tu ime
ABbwe eli ngu Klistu Na twa zu mamana
Tu ya ku yuma Munkamu ya bana Leza.

2
A muyume mu kasimpe aka a ku ta yowa, a ku syomeka;
IBbwe li like li la pa nguzu Munyika ya ma penzyi.

3
A mu yume muzwi lyakwe Leza Na li mukisya, lili kasimpe
IBbwe lyalo lipa ku umuuna Maka tazyo naa maana.

title: 39: BWE LIYUMU
content:
CS 294AH 212

CH 581SDAH 522
39BWE LIYUMU
MY HOPE IS BUILT

Doh is G
1
Kulangila kwangu konse, Kuli mu bulowa bwakwe,
Ndasyoma Jesu a like, Nguwa ka ndi salulula

CIINDULULO
Jesu alike, ndiBbwe oyu
Zimana nsi zi yandi pe, Zimana nsi zi yandi pe.

2
Na mu dima wa musisa, Ndajata luse luyumu;
Na kuba ma penzyi abe, Nda tijila kuli nguwe.

3
BulowÕ acizuminano, Zindi vuna muma sunko;
Bamwi ni bawa kucibi, Ndiya kukala a nguwe.

4
A kubola a mukunga, Ndayanda a kantambule,
Nsisamide bululami, Nsi takwe kaambo awalo.

title: 40: KUSYOMA A KUTELELA
content:
CS 495AH 223

CH 582SDAH 590
40KUSYOMA A KUTELELA
TRUST AND OBEY

Doh is F
1
Ni tu ya a Leza mu Luyando lwakwe,
U salazya inzila yesu
Ni twa mu telela u kala aswebo.
A ba syoma a ba telela.

CIINDULULO
Mu telele, mbo kunyina Ônzila
Imbi I komanisya, pele ku telela.

2
Tunyina mukuli, tunyina kupenga,
Kambo Jesu uli aswebo;
Kunyina kuyowa kunyina misozyi.
Kuti twa syoma tu telela.

3
E amu yandane, a tu kale munsi
Ni tu enda aye munzila,
Nca amba tu cite, tu tumwe tu ende;
Mu ta yowi pesi mu syome.

title: 41: LEZA A BE ANYWEBO
content:
CS 504AH 479

CH 35SDAH 65
41LEZA A BE ANYWEBO
GOD BE WITH YOU!

Doh is Db
1
Leza a be anywebo nyonse, Tu ka swangane alimwi;
A mu sololele konse, Leza a be anywebo nyonse.

CIINDULULO
Lyoonse, lyoonse, tu ka sike kwa Jesu
A kale anywebo, tu ka swangane alimwi ko.

2
Leza a be anywebo nyonse, A Mu vumbe a mababa,
A mu abile mikamu, Leza a be anywebo nyoonse.

3
Leza a be anywebo nyoonse; No mu li mu ku pengesya,
A mu kumbate kabotu. Leza a be anywebo nyoonse.

4
Leza a be anywebo nyoonse; A mu tondezye luyando,
A gusye lufu kuli Ônywe, Leza a be anywebo nyoonse.

title: 42: TATU KAANDANI
content:
CS 866

42TATU KAANDANI
WITH FRIENDS ON EARTH

Doh is Bb
1
Nitujisi benzuma mu nyika imbotu yesu
Ku fwambana tulaandana Ômbabo mu kuusa.

CIINDULULO
Tatu ka Ôndani kujulu, Tatu kaandani
Munyika imbotu kuya, Tatu kaandani

2
A benzuma bafwa tulasyoma, cisyomyo ciya
Kuti nyika Ôyi yamana yonse, Tuya kuswana

3
Akwimba nyimbo zya kukomana nkambo Twaswana
Tatu kaandani alimwi munyika imbotu.

title: 43: BA LA ONA KULI JESU
content:
CS 846AH 477

CH 489
43BA LA ONA KULI JESU
ASLEEP IN JESUS

Doh is D
1
Ba la ona kuli Jesu!
Ba buka ta ba lili mo;
Ba la lyokezya kabotu,
Kunyina o ci ba penzya.

2
Nkubotu kona ku Mwami,
A ba ona, ba la colwe!
Bala unka a kusyoma,
Basyoma colwe ca Mwami.

3
Ku ona kwa kuumuna,
Ba la ku buka a colwe,
BÕona, ta ba kwe ku yowa,
Na ya ku ba busya Mwami.

4
O BÕona, ba la ku buka,
Ya lila impeta yakwe,
Ba la ku zwa Muntolongo,
Ta ba kwe ku fwa alimwi.

title: 44: NJA KU MUZYIBE MUFUTULI WANGU
content:
CS 849

44NJA KU MUZYIBE MUFUTULI WANGU
WHEN MY LIFE WORK IS ENDED

Doh is Ab
1
Ndamana milimo yangu yonse mu nyika eyi
Nja kusamikwa mubili utafwi
Elyo nja ku muzyiba Mufutuli kabotu
Uya ku ndi cinga caku komana.

CIINDULULO:
Nkamuzyibe, nkamuzyibe,
Nda kwima a munsi lyakwe Jesu
Nka muzyibe, nkamuzyibe
Ainembe mu maanza akwe

2
Ndiya ku komana abusyu bwa kuumuna
A meso akwe ala luse lunji
Ndiya ku mulumbaizya waka ndiyandisya
A ku ndi bambila ngÕanda ya bwami

3
Bayandika bangu twa kaandana kaindi
Aku layana oko ku mulonga
Ta tukaandani mu mabanda a Edeni
Pesi ntaangune mbone Mufutuli.

4
Nka njile mu munzi nsisamide zituba bu
A kandinjizye mutalili bantu
Lwimbo olutamani ndiya kwiimba ambabo
Pesi ntangune nswanye Mufutuli.

title: 45: NDIPE ÔBAIBELE
content:
CS 498AH 164

CH 655SDAH 272
45NDIPE ÔBAIBELE
GIVE ME THE BIBLE

Doh is Ab
1
Ndipa ÔBaibele, nyenyenzi imweka
Ku komanya mwenzu usoweka
Kupenga ta ku kwe ku ku zi manya,
Jesu mbwa ka sika ku ba vuna.

CIINDULULO:
Ndipa Baibele, kambo kalomenye
Kusala kwako kula ndenzya
Mulawo a cisyomyo ca luyando
Limwi mudima uka manisye.

2
Ndipa ÔBaibele, no ucisa moyo,
Amuya wa vula zinyonyono,
Ko ndipa majwi aka ambwa Jesu,
Ko munika ndi mubone Jesu

3
Ndipa ÔBaibele, lisa lazye Ônzila,
Li tondezya kubi kwa munyika
Li tondezya kusalala kwa Mwami
Litondezya Jordani libotu.

title: 46: MAJWI A KUFUTUKA
content:
CS 74AH 162

CH 574SDAH 286
46MAJWI A KUFUTUKA
SING THEM OVER AGAIN

Doh is G
1
Ko ci ndi imbila kanji majwi a futusya;
Ko ndi bo nisyisya kanji Majwi afutusya
Makani mabotu A ndi yiya kakwe.

CIINDULULO:
Onse aya mabotu, Majwi a futusya;
Onse aya mabotu, Majwi a futusya.

2
Jesu wakabapa bonse Majwi a futusya;
O mubisyi te lelesya Majwi afutusya
Twa kape gwa buyo kututo la kwakwe.

3
Kobambila bantu bonse Majwi afutusya;
Ko batola ku kumuna Majwi a futusya
Mufutuli wesu tu botezye lyoonse.

title: 47: INKOMWE YA JORDANI
content:
CS 905AH 419

CH 553SDAH 620
47INKOMWE YA JORDANI
ON JORDANÕS STORMY BANKS

Doh is G
1
A inkomwe ya Jordani, Ndalanga kwitala,
Kunyik Ôeyo ya kenani Nce cilawo cangu.

CIINDULULO:
Tonse tula ku lyokezya oko Ku nyika eyo isalala
Tula kwimba lwimbo lwa Mosi a Jesu Mukenani ku tamani.

2
Mu mabanda aya oonse A salala ngwa,
Jesu ndizuba lya nyika, Wa mwaya mudima.

3
Ndila kusika okuli Kukomana lyoonse
Kubona busyu bwa Taata Mu bu lelo bwakwe.

4
Muya wangu kukomana To yandi munyika
Utayowi mankusyita U yakula nduka.

title: 48: KUKOMANA KWA SWENA
content:
CS 863SDAH 430

48KUKOMANA KWA SWENA
O THEREÕLL BE JOY

Doh is
1
Kulaba ku komana koonse, Ba ku kotoka mulimo
Baleta micelo yabo Bainjizye mu munzi.

CIINDULULO:
Kuya kuba ku komana Ku komana kutamani
Nkaambo ciindi cabo casika Ca kunjila mu munzi.

2
Tuya kwiimba nyimbo zibotu A kulemeka muvuni
Tuya kulumba Muvuni Mu munzi mubotÕ omo.

3
Kukoman kula tulinda Ku munzi iwa golide
Jesu ula tuba mbila Cilawo mu munzÕ omo.

title: 49: MUZEEZO MU BOTU
content:
CS 882AH 324

CH 352
49MUZEEZO MU BOTU
ONE SWEETLY SOLEMN THOUGHT

Doh is Bb
1
Kuyeya kubotu, Kulazwa mu moyo,
Ku munzi kwa fwimpa lino, Kuinda kaindi.

CIINDULULO:
Ndi afwafwi a ku munzi
Ndi afwafwi a ku munzi
Kuinda kaindi.

2
Ku fwafwi atata, Nko kuli ciilawo
A cuuno ca Jesu Mwami, Ku lwizyi lumweka.

3
Nda binda mu lweendo, Nkatule mukuli
Kutula Ciingano cangu, Ndisame munjila.

title: 50: KUNYIKA IMBOTU
content:
CS 879AH 432

CH 551SDAH 428
50KUNYIKA IMBOTU
THEREÕS A LAND

Doh is G
1
Nyika mbotu nko ili kuya, I lamweka kuiinda Zuba
Taata ulabamba cilawo Tuka kale aguwe kuya.

CIINDULULO:
Kunyika imbotu Tuka swangane kunyika eyo
Kunyika imbotu Tuka swangane kunyika eyo

2
Tuya kuimba kunyikÕ eyo Inyimbo zibotu bunene
Tatu kwe kuunsa insoni Pele kulyookezya kulike.

3
Taata tula kulumbaizya Mbowaka tutu mina Jesu
Kutu gusya muzi nyonyono A kutuleleka mu myoyo.

title: 51: KOTU BBAPATIZYA
content:
CS 134AH 155

CH 525SDAH 258
51KOTU BBAPATIZYA
BAPTIZE US A NEW

Doh is Ab
1
Tu bbapatizye mu nguzu zyako
A luse, tu busye, Ko kala munsi.

CIINDULULO:
Tu la ku komba a lubomba Mwami
Ko to bbapatizya mu muya sunu.

2
Ta tu elele, tujisi tombe,
Tu sanzye kabotu mukubi koonse.

3
Inziba yako seluka kwangu,
Twa lomba kulelwa, swena mu luse.

4
Teelela I jwi! Lizwa kujulu:
Ndi we ngwe ndi yanda, ndi la komana.

title: 52: TINTI LYA ZILELEKO
content:
CS 398AH 197

CH 291SDAH 334
52TINTI LYA ZILELEKO
COME, THIU FOUNT

Doh is Eb
1
Mubole a zileleko Moyo wangu uimbe;
Luse lwako luta nsiyi Anditambule luse
Kondi yisya kuzumina A kuti ndi kuzyibe
Elyo kulangila kwangu kwazuzya moyo onse.

2
Mugwasyi ndiwe wandeta A kundigwasya lyoonse
Muluse lwenu nkasike kumunzi wa kujulu
Jesu wandiyandaula nda kali sowekede
Wakatila ibulowa naka ndiangulula.

3
Jesu ndipe luse lwako Nkaambo ime ndabula
Undi kwele iwe, kwako a luyando lupati,
Kuzimina nsikuyandi A ku kusiya iwe
Tola moyo wangu mubi, ukabe wako lyoonse.

title: 53: MUYA MUBOTU
content:
CS 632AH 148

CH 211
53MUYA MUBOTU
HOLY SPIRIT, FAITHFUL GUIDE

Doh is G
1
Muya mubotu, mwenzyi, O kala a ba Jesu;
Ko tu enzya kabotu, Tuli benzu munkanda
Bakatele ba seka No ba telela ijwi

CIINDULULO:
Liamba mwenzu boola, ndila kwenzya ku munzi.

2
Ula Ôswebo Mukwesu, U la fwafwi ku gwasya,
Ta tu sii tu like, Mu mudima u siya;
No lu ungisya luwo Myoyo I la yowesya.

title: 54: MUYA USALALA
content:
CS 19AH 243

CH 634
54MUYA USALALA
ONE THING I OF THE LORD

Doh is Bb
1
Nyanda cintu comwi buyo
Nkaambo ndakawida muntimba;
A mulimo a mu meenda,
Undisanzye, undisanzye.

CIINDULULO:
Kondisanzya onse moyo
A meenda na amulilo
Na undisanzye mu cibi
Na cizwe coonse mu moyo.

2
Na wandijalula meso,
Ndiya ku kulumbaizya;
Nyanda buumi bulule me
Ta ku cimbi ncendiyanda.

3
Namuya wasanzyikwa bu
Meso aya kulangisya
Nkaambo kulindiwe julu;
Litondezya ibulemu

4
Ndila sola kuli bosya,
Kuli gusya Zinyonyono
Na kuba boobo O Mwami
Nsiyelede Mwami wangu.

title: 55: WASAMBA MU BULOWA
content:
CS 88

55WASAMBA MU BULOWA
HAVE YOU BEEN TO JESUS!

Doh is Ab
1
Wakali kuli Jesu kusanzyigwa? Wasamba mu bulowa bwakwe
Hena ula syoma mu nguzu zyakwe, Wa samba mu bulowa bwakwe.

CIINDULULO:
Wasamba bulowa, Mbwa katila mwana mbelele?
Hena Minjila yako yatuba bu wasamba mu bulowa bwakwe.

2
Hena ula enda a Mufutuli? Hena wasamba mu bulowa?
Hena wasamba mu cingano cakwe? Wasamba mu bulowa bwakwe.

3
Na bwinga abola kulaba buti? Muya kuli bambila sena?
Mula lyokezya sena mu ciingano? Wasamba mu bulowa bwakwe.

4
Kosowa zikobela zila tombe Usambe mubulowa bwakwe
Mpolili itinti ku babi abo Basamba mu bulowa bwakwe.

.

title: 56: MWAMI NDA ZYOKA
content:
CS 17 AH 186

CH 560SDAH 296
56MWAMI NDA ZYOKA
IÕVE WANDERED FAR AWAY

Doh is A
1
Nda ka zimina kwa Leza, Lino nda zyoka;
Nda kali kwenda mu kubi Mwami nda Zyoka.

CIINDULULO:
Nda zyoka, nda zyoka, Nsi ka ku sii
Mwami ko ndi tambula Mwami nda zyoka.

2
Nda ka sowa myaka minji Lino nda zyoka
Limwi nda Leka nda lila, Mwami nda zyoka

3
Nda katala kwingaila, Lino nda zyoka
Ndila kondwa mazwi ako Mwami nda zyoka

4
Jesu nku kusyoma kwangu, Lino nda zyoka
Jesu omwa kandi fwida, Mwami nda zyoka

5
Ndabula bulowa bwa kwe Lino nda zyoka
Ko ndi sanzya, kondi tubya Mwami nda zyoka

title: 57: KUFUMBWA UYANDA
content:
CS 12AH 179

CH 571
57KUFUMBWA UYANDA
WHOSOEVER HEARETH

Doh is D
1
Onse utelela na ompolole
Mulumbe uya ku masi amasi
Kambaukila bantu konse konse
wa telela na bole!

CIINDULULO:
Oyo uyanda, o yo uyanda;
Kotumina mulumbe konse konse
Tata wa luyando ulatu ita
Wa telela na bole!

2
Onse utelela na ompolole;
Mulyango wajaluka lino njila
Jesu alike njenzila ya bumi;
Wa telela na bole!

3
Onse uyandisya nzila imbotu
Onse uyandisya bola ukale;
Onse uyandisya kupona lyoonse
Onse uyanda Ôbole!

title: 58: NGUZU ZYA JESU
content:
CS 258AH 126

CH 156SDAH 229
58NGUZU ZYA JESU
ALL HAIL THE POWER

Doh is G
1
Lumba nguzu zya Jesu bangele bavuntame
Mulete musyini oyo mu musamike Mwami,
Mulete musyini oyo mu musamike Mwami.

2
Inywe mwakasalwa alimwi mwakafutulwa
Tula ku mulumbaizya waka tu futula.
Tula ku mulumbaizya waka tu futula.

3
Bantu bonse mikowa yonse balumbaizye
Bamusamike musyini aku mulemeka
Bamusamike musyini aku mulemeka.

4
Tulayanda tuka muvuntamine kufwafwi
Tuka mwimbile kutamani aku komana.
Tuka mwimbile kutamani aku komana.

title: 59: JESU MUYANDI WA BUUMI BWANGU
content:
CS 633AH 116

CH 401SDAH 489
59JESU MUYANDI WA BUUMI BWANGU
JESUS LOVER OF MY SOUL

Doh is F
1
Jesu muyandi wangu ndaboola kuli ndiwe
Mapenzi na abola Kuyeya kulavula
Kondisisa O Mwami mapenzi naasika
Kondiita nze kwako ndijane lufutuko.

2
Coonde cimbi nsijisi Pele iwe O Mwami
Ime ndili mucete Mwami utandisiyi
Iwe uli muvini Ime Ndila kusyoma
Undivumbe mababa Moyo naunetuka.

3
Muli Klistu ndajana konse nkwe ndiyandisya
Baciswa a bapenga Mulaba komanisya
Zyina lisetekene, nsyikwete kululama
Ime ndili mubisyi Pesi ndiwe kasimpe

4
Luyando lulagusya zibi zyangu zya kale
Mbe muntu usalala Abulowa bwa Jesu
Ndilayanda mukalo ndinywe meenda a Jesu
Ndi nywe mutinti lyako Ndita fwi limbi nyota.

title: 60: JESU NDIWE KU KOMANA
content:
CS 452AH 128

Amu teelele nobasizibi, Mulilo ubambidwe babi;
Ku julu nkwa baluleme, Tula cita buti?

3
Na ilamana insi eyi, Na kuti sunu
Jesu aboole, Nakuti waita bakwe Tulacita buti?

title: 340: IMBISYA LWIIMBO LWA LUMAMBA
content:
340IMBISYA LWIIMBO LWA LUMAMBA

SOUND THE BATTLE CRY

1
Ko imbisya lwiimbo lwa lumamba,
Bweza mulawo wa Mwami,
Mubweze makano Mutayoowi,
A mu syome ijwi lya Mwami.

CIINDULILO:
Amu yumuke basilumamba
Muli bambe ka mwambilana,
Muye kumbele muye buimba,
Jesu ula mosololela.

2
Tulaya kulwana sinkondoma,
Tulielede kukoma,
Intobo zyesu zila salala,
Iswe twa lwanina kasimpe.

3
Mwami wa boonse kotuleleka,
Tugwasye aluse lwako,
Lwamana lumamba notwakoma,
Tuka same musyini kwako.

title: 341: NDALI SALILA
content:
341NDALI SALILA

I HAVE DECIDED

1
Ndalisalila ku musebezela, Jesu wangu (2)

CIINDULULO:
Kwenda a Jesu mazuba onse,
Kwenda a Jesu mubumi bwangu bonse,
Muya usalala, uya kundenzya,
Kwenda a Jesu mazuba onse.

2
Bamwi bakaka kumu sebenzela, Jesu wangu (2)

3
Ndasiya zya nyika, Nkamusebenzele, Jesu wangu (2)
